title: Relative Clauses 1
description: Add the phrase in brackets to the sentence using 'that' or 'who' and a relative clause:

parts.value: She worked for a man (the man used to be an athlete)

parts.answer: She worked for a man who used to be an athlete
answerList: She worked for a man who used to be an athlete
She worked for a man that used to be an athlete

parts.value: They called a lawyer (the lawyer lived nearby)

parts.answer: They called a lawyer who lived nearby
answerList: They called a lawyer who lived nearby
They called a lawyer that lived nearby

parts.value: I sent an email to my brother (my brother lives in Australia)

parts.answer: I sent an email to my brother who lives in Australia
answerList: I sent an email to my brother who lives in Australia
I sent an email to my brother that lives in Australia

parts.value: The customer liked the waitress (the waitress was very friendly)

parts.answer: The customer liked the waitress who was very friendly
answerList: The customer liked the waitress who was very friendly
The customer liked the waitress that was very friendly

parts.answer: We broke the computer that belonged to my father
answerList: We broke the computer that belonged to my father
